001package com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.persistentsubscriber;
002
003import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.Configuration;
004import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.persistentsubscriber.spi.PersistentSubscriberConfiguration;
005
006import java.util.Collections;
007import java.util.List;
008
009public record PersistentSubscribersConfiguration(Configuration configuration) {
010
011
012    public String getDefaultCheckpointProvider() {
013        return configuration.getString("defaultCheckpointProvider").orElse("file");
014    }
015
016    public String getDefaultErrorLogProvider() {
017        return configuration.getString("defaultErrorLogProvider").orElse("file");
018    }
019
020    public List<PersistentSubscriberConfiguration> getPersistentSubscribers() {
021        return configuration.getObjectListAs("subscribers", PersistentSubscriberConfiguration::new)
022                .orElse(Collections.emptyList());
023    }
024
025
026}
